title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe:
description:
These two files fix the broken files included in this torrent: http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3846461/The.Chronicles.Of.Narnia.The.Lion.The.Witch.And.The.Wardrobe.200

To use these, rename the other two files by putting .bak on the end or something like that, and then place these new files in the Disk4 directory and then extract the img. After that, remove these new files and rename the original files back to the original name so that you can continue seeding the big torrent. :) This way others can enjoy that finest release of LWW on this site. :D

This is my first release on PB, but I had other releases on another site under a different name, so if this any of this is not correct, then let me know and I will fix it.

Thanks.
